text:
And he should! I'm sick of playing nice with adrenochrome junkies and serial pedophiles!


WWG1WGA!
What's wrong with being gay? Stooge.

I don’t think it’s gonna be president trump in the garbage truck that comes by your house. I wish it was. But I think you’ll have to deal with my African American friend the garbage man instead. He’ll have no trouble tossing you in.
